text: 4|170|He manara! Niscaya raachule tomalokara pratipalakara paraa satya lai ahiche, eteke tomaloke imana ana, e'itorae tomalokara babe kalyanakara haâ€™ba arau yadi tomaloke kupharai karaa tente (jani thoraa) akasamandala arau prthiraita yi ache se'i sakalo allaharae'i; arau allaha sarbajna, prajnamaya.
